TopicTitle: The nightmare of Jeb and Bill: The rescue ship continues to explode

Articles.Content:
Jeb bill and continue to make this dream: when they approach the ship should report them on Kerbin, about 300m, the ship explodes, leaving them alone and with a walk of 6km to go back to the shuttle.

This is the third time, even after the control center updated the software to v0.20.2 to tranquillize Bill. What's the problem with Bill?

The ship that worries them:

A drawing of the dream by the descriptions of Bill:

I wanna help them, but without send the third rescue mission

Oh, and Jeb is doing strange dreams about coming back to Kerbin with RCS integrated in the suit ...
I'm... not sure what this is supposed to be...?

I'm... not sure what this is supposed to be...?

What he said. I don't really understand.

Maybe he's asking why his lander keeps blowing up whenever a Kerbal gets within 300m???

At least thats what I get out of it?!?!?!
